thread.title: Thaman in overdrive mode for Bruce Lee
thread.title_full: Thaman in overdrive mode for Bruce Lee - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Thaman in overdrive mode for Bruce Lee
text: It's celebration time for fans as the Ram Charan starrer, Bruce Lee is set for a grand release this October 16. The music album is creating a huge buzz and latest update reveals that Thaman has completed the re-recording of the film in just nine days. The ace musician has been working night and day to give the film a rocking effect. The trailers are making a lot of noise and with Chiranjeevi being a part of the project, the expectations are sky high. Rakul Preet is the female lead and DVV Danayya is the producer.
